definitions.definition: A slapstick performance artist often associated with a circus and usually characterized by bright, oversized clothing, a red nose, face paint , and a brightly colored wig .
A person who acts in a silly fashion.
examples: He was regarded as the clown of the school, always playing pranks.

definitions.definition: A man of coarse nature and manners; an awkward fellow; an illbred person; a boor.
One who works upon the soil; a rustic; a churl ; a yokel .

main_definition: A slapstick performance artist often associated with a circus and usually characterized by bright, oversized clothing, a red nose, face paint , and a brightly colored wig .
